channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists say it may be possible to protect aging brains from Alzheimer’s with an old remedy — lithium
Lawyer condemns $1.3 million compensation for Australian woman wrongfully imprisoned for 20 years

16-Foot Tsunami Waves Detonate on Russian Coast (Watch)

item.description: Hundreds of Harvard researchers have fallen victim to the freeze on funding by the Trump administration

item.title: What to know as Trump's immigration crackdown strips tuition breaks from thousands of students

item.title: Jen Pawol will be MLB's first female umpire. Here are other women who broke officiating barriers
item.description: Jen Pawol is set to make history as the first woman to umpire a Major League Baseball game

item.title: Man accused of killing Israeli Embassy staffers indicted on federal hate crimes charges
item.description: The man accused of shooting two Israeli Embassy staff members outside a Jewish museum in Washington has been indicted on federal hate crimes charges
